scripts.build:pkgs: lerna --scope=@myscope/pkg--* exec --parallel -- BABEL_ENV=build babel --root-mode upward src -d dist -s --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.build:serhii:doesNotwork: lerna --scope=@myscope/pkg--* exec --parallel 'BABEL_ENV=build babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx.js,.jsx --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments'
scripts.build:cleanAll: yarn workspaces run build:clean && lerna --scope=@myscope/app--* exec --parallel -- rm -fr lib
